import React from 'react'; import './Post.css'; import MoreVertOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/MoreVertOutlined"; import FavoriteBorderOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/FavoriteBorderOutlined"; import ModeCommentOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ModeCommentOutlined"; import SendOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/SendOutlined"; import BookmarkBorderOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/BookmarkBorderOutlined"; import SentimentSatisfiedAltOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/SentimentSatisfiedAltOutlined"; const Post = ({item}) => { return (
{item.name}
{item.name}

{item.Comment}

{Post}
) } export default Post;
